floorArea = #{floorarea,jdbcType=REAL},

update house_community set community_no = #{communityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_name = #{communityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_address = #{communityAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_year = #{buildYear,jdbcType=DATE}, complate_year = #{complateYear,jdbcType=DATE}, tents = #{tents,jdbcType=INTEGER}, structureType = #{structuretype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, developer = #{developer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, propertyManagement = #{propertymanagement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Property_expense = #{propertyExpense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, property_type_id = #{propertyTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_area = #{communityArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floorArea = #{floorarea,jdbcType=REAL}, startSaleDate = #{startsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, plot_ratio = #{plotRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, landscaping_ratio = #{landscapingRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, sh_count = #{shCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rent_count = #{rentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, picture_count = #{pictureCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_circle_id = #{businessCircleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parking_count = #{parkingCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_count = #{houseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inital = #{inital,jdbcType=CHAR}, sortindex = #{sortindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastmodified = #{lastmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastsync = #{lastsync,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, huanbishangyue = #{huanbishangyue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, tongbiqunian = #{tongbiqunian,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, deleteflag = #{deleteflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_month_sh_avg_price = #{currentMonthShAvgPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, current_month_rh_avg_price = #{currentMonthRhAvgPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, huanbishangyuerh = #{huanbishangyuerh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, tongbiqunianrh = #{tongbiqunianrh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nearest_store = #{nearestStore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_image = #{coverImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where erp_id = #{erpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT hc.erp_id, community_no, community_name, title, community_address, build_year, complate_year, tents, structureType, developer, propertyManagement, Property_expense, property_type_id, hc.location, community_area, floorArea, startSaleDate, plot_ratio, landscaping_ratio, hc.sh_count, hc.rent_count, picture_count, business_circle_id, parking_count, house_count, hc.city_id, region_id, inital, hc.sortindex, pinyin, introduction, hc.lastmodified, hc.lastsync, huanbishangyue, tongbiqunian, hc.deleteflag, current_month_sh_avg_price, current_month_rh_avg_price, huanbishangyuerh, tongbiqunianrh, nearest_store, cover_image, pic_count, cco.county_name, ccw.name as websiteName, ccw.website_id FROM house_community hc INNER JOIN common_cbd cc ON (hc.business_circle_id = cc.erp_id) INNER JOIN common_cbd_website ccw ON (ccw.website_id = cc.belong_to) INNER JOIN common_county cco ON (cco.erp_id = hc.region_id)
INNER JOIN house_community_subway_station_mapping hcssm ON (hcssm.community_id=hc.erp_id) INNER JOIN common_subway_station css ON (css.erp_id=hcssm.subway_station_id)
INNER JOIN house_community_subway_station_mapping hcssm ON (hcssm.community_id=hc.erp_id) INNER JOIN common_subway_station css ON (css.erp_id=hcssm.subway_station_id AND css.erp_id=#{subway_station_id[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INNER JOIN common_subway cs ON (cs.erp_id=css.station_line_id AND cs.erp_id=#{station_line_id[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INNER JOIN house_community_subway_station_mapping hcssm ON (hcssm.community_id=hc.erp_id) INNER JOIN common_subway_station css ON (css.erp_id=hcssm.subway_station_id)
AND (hcssm.distance BETWEEN #{subwayDistance[0]} AND #{subwayDistance[1]})
AND (ccw.website_id = #{cbdId[0]})
AND (hc.region_id = #{countyId[0]})
AND (hc.current_month_sh_avg_price BETWEEN #{avgPrice[0]} AND #{avgPrice[1]} )
AND ( hc.build_year BETWEEN #{buildYear[0]} AND #{buildYear[1]} hc.build_year = #{buildYear[0]} )
AND (inital = #{inital[0]})
AND (hc.erp_id = #{communityErpId[0]})
AND (hc.erp_id = #{homePageBySearchField[0]}
OR cc.erp_id in
#{listItem}
OR ccw.website_id in
#{listItem}
OR hc.erp_id in
#{listItem}
OR css.erp_id in
#{listItem}
)
AND (hc.erp_id != #{neCommunityId[0]})
AND (hc.business_circle_id = #{ERPcbdId[0]})
GROUP BY hc.erp_id
ORDER BY ${orderby[0]}, hc.sh_count DESC, hc.rent_count ASC, hc.erp_id ASC
ORDER BY hc.sh_count DESC, hc.rent_count ASC , hc.erp_id ASC
